bibl.title: The Hartford Horseman.
bibl.note: Panel painting. Wadsworth Atheneum, Hartford, Conn. Inv. 1934.6. - Presented at the 75th General Meeting of the Archaeological Institute of America. - Complete publication in Bulletin of the Wadsworth Atheneum 1972.
bibl.seg: Thompson David L., The Hartford Horseman.
